body.name: BRITULIF Handheld Bidet Sprayer for Toilet, Jet Sprayer for Toilet Muslim Shower, Adjustable Cloth Diaper Sprayer Bidets Attachment for Toilet, Toilet Sprayer with Bidet Hose for Feminine Wash

features: Optimum Size Avoiding Wrong Purchase: If you buy the toilet water sprayer back and find that the size is not appropriate, it is a very annoying thing. Our T-valve size is applicable to most American toilets, the diameter for the T-valve connecting your toilet tank or supply line is about 22.05mm(0.868”), also called 7/8” T valve. Pls confirm the size of bidet toilet sprayer before purchasing.

Two Mount Option for Multiple Purpose: The hand bidet sprayer for toilet set supports tank mount and wall mount. Tank mounted installation - simply hook bidet sprayer head holder to your toilet tank, saving bathroom space and no need to drill holes. Wall mounted installation- available to supply multiple use according to your different needs, such as cloth diaper sprayer, pet shower, car wash, baby shower and so on.

Easy to Control Enjoying the Life: You can control the water pressure by pressing the handheld bidet lever. You are sure to love the strong jet spray for toilet when the handle is fully pressed. Once the lever is released, it will automatically stop spraying. You can enjoy the fresh and clean feeling after use!

New Hybrid Design Preventing Leakage: Nylon T-valve for perfect match, black washer for sealing well, brass faucet valve for leakage-free. Every design of your hand held bidet for toilet is to prevent leakage, so that you can buy it at ease and use it comfortably. Your satisfaction is our greatest motivation.

High Quality for Better Use: Are you looking for a high quality handheld bidet sprayer for toilet device to meet your bathroom cleaning needs? This handheld sprayer kit is made of 304 stainless steel with higher durability, oxidation resistance and corrosion resistance, which will surely satisfy you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality (undercarriage) sprayer.
reviews.reviewText: The kit is simple to install and comes with everything you need. You don’t even have to shut the main water line off, just the toilet faucet valve. You do need some basic tools, namely an adjustable wrench or pliers. Product quality seem to be decent and doesn’t have that one-time-use-then-break feeling to it.Using a bidet sprayer is one of, if not the most, effective and sanitary method of washing up your undercarriage. The sprayer head of this particular model has a variable trigger allowing the user to control water pressure. It won’t strafe the valley of the shadow of death between your double cheeks. For the leery on using bidets and would rather stick with “wipers”, I say give it shot. It cleans better than TP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Peace of mind, easy to install. I was hoping to find a handyman to install it but after reading the instructions and watching the tutorial video it took me less than 10min to get the job done! It works well I'm very satisfied. Let's just wait to see how long it lasts before breaking down. Will update....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Life-Changing Addition to My Bathroom: A Five-Star Bidet Experience
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased a bidet for my bathroom, and I must say it has been an absolute game-changer! I am so thrilled with my decision and can't stop raving about the incredible benefits it has brought to my daily routine. Here are a few reasons why this bidet deserves a solid five-star review:1. Unparalleled Cleanliness: The bidet's gentle water spray provides a level of cleanliness that I didn't know was possible. It leaves me feeling refreshed, hygienic, and confident throughout the day. No more relying solely on toilet paper, as the bidet effortlessly takes care of everything.2. Adjustable Water Pressure and Temperature: One of the features I love most about my bidet is the ability to customize the water pressure and temperature. It offers a range of options, from a gentle mist to a more powerful spray, ensuring a comfortable and personalized experience every time. The adjustable temperature feature is particularly luxurious during those chilly mornings!3. Eco-Friendly and Cost-Effective: I am thrilled to be reducing my environmental footprint by using a bidet. Not only does it significantly reduce the amount of toilet paper I use, but it also saves me money in the long run. It's a win-win situation for both my wallet and the planet.4. Easy Installation and User-Friendly Design: Setting up the bidet was surprisingly simple. The installation process was straightforward, and it seamlessly integrates with my existing toilet. The bidet's control panel is intuitive and user-friendly, making it a breeze to navigate through the various functions and settings.5. Luxurious and Spa-Like Experience: Using my bidet has transformed my bathroom into a personal oasis. The gentle water spray and soothing sensation make me feel like I'm indulging in a spa-like experience every time I use it. It has truly elevated my bathroom routine and added a touch of luxury to my daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Efficient to use
reviews.reviewText: First thing I really like the bidet ..it’s easy , effective and so much easy to clean anything .. it was an easy setup with all the instructions.. literally took me 15 minutes to set it up .. the only thing that bothers me is the flow of water .. I’m not sure if it’s the water pressure from the internal pipe or the problem is with the bidet cuz at times the water pressure is high and good but at times it’s just tooo weak and is not hitting or cleaning with the pressure though my toilet water tank is getting filled fast I’m not sure of the cause for pressure fluctuation but overall it’s good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Handy and useful
reviews.reviewText: This handheld bidet sprayer works well for last 4 months. It is very helpful cleaning bathroom sink and for kids. We installed into our all Toilets and one of them was slow leakage so we have to close water inlet whenever we are not using. We removed and reinstalled entire kit, still leaked .We tried to check the plumber tape coverage in thread at bidet sprayer, it was fully covered. I tried applying plumbers tape evenly and tested still leaked and thought of disconnect this kit. Finally, tried the option of removed the plumbers tape at sprayer and tested. Wow. This time no water leakage so we opened water inlet.It has been more than a week we use that leaked sprayer without any issues.Tips:If you notice water leakage from sprayer/hose check all thread connectors and tighten it. Another option, use plumbers tape little/more or nothing to test water leakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: The package was received within the promised timeframe. It was well packaged to protect the product during shipping. The instructions are easy to follow and the entire setup is simple. You don't need a plumber, its that easy. The quality of the material is good and the operation is great. I used the hook on tank rather than hanging on wall, this saved having to drill a hole in the wall. Everything is included right down to the plumbers tape. The hose is long enough and the water pressure is fine (this depends on the water pressure at your place). I recommend this product to anyone needing a bidet sprayer without the expense of the traditional bidet system or if you have limited space in your bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Must have! Clear instructions. Easy installation. Barely took 5 minutes to install. Works amazing. If yours leaks then you received a faulty item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Now that I've owned different bidets I don't know how I ever lived without them. I find that a sprayer is easier for me to use .I have installed the ones that go underneath the toilet seat and I've installed the sprayer. The sprayer I was able to put on my toilet and working within 5 minutes. So if you want to do it fast and you want to do it easily, and then have a bidet, that is easy to use. Get this one. Also the instructions are very very easily understood.Edited , after a few days of using .This sprayer tends to spray very vociferously, but if you don't depress the handle all the way you can kind of monitor the water that comes out of it so it's not too strong.

reviews.reviewTitle: Life-Changer! The Best Investment I’ve Made!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased this bidet from Amazon, and I cannot express how absolutely life-changing this product has been for me! From the moment it arrived at my doorstep, I knew I was in for something special.Installation was a breeze; it took me less than 10 minutes, even though I’m not particularly handy. The instructions were clear, and all the necessary parts were included. Once it was set up, I couldn’t wait to try it out, and it exceeded my expectations in every way.Firstly, the hygiene benefits are astounding. Not only do I feel incredibly clean after each use, but it’s also gentle and soothing. Say goodbye to uncomfortable wiping and hello to a fresh, clean feeling that will leave you wondering how you ever managed without it.But that’s not all – the bidet has proven to be incredibly eco-friendly as well. I’ve drastically reduced my toilet paper consumption, which not only saves me money but also contributes to a greener planet. It’s a win-win situation!Maintenance is a breeze. I appreciate how easy it is to keep the bidet clean.In terms of durability, this bidet is built to last. The high-quality materials and construction give me confidence that this investment will continue to pay off for years to come.In summary, I can’t recommend this bidet enough. It’s not just a bathroom accessory; it’s a lifestyle upgrade. It’s the kind of product that makes you wonder how you ever lived without it. If you’re considering purchasing a bidet, do yourself a favor and choose this one. It’s a purchase you won’t regret, and your posterior will thank you every day!

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: In comparison to three other bidets I purchased before this one, I must say this one fared best. Quality and design are good and set up was easy to follow. So far no issues and all components work extremely well with no leakages.

reviews.reviewTitle: Looks good and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Easy installation and good finish of the product. Just a minor quibble about the quality of plumber tape which was not good.
Easy installation and very good and practical product.
Great product and easy to install 😀
